pages.title: P-Buddysteel Medal
pages.text: Made with perfect buddysteel, the zylex and luminis medals, and 3 epic buddycards as a sacrifice, the perfect buddysteel medal is the best medal in general. It also has all the abilities of the zylex and luminis medals.

pages.title: Relations & Buddy Boost
pages.text: The medal will grant you grading luck that increases with both Buddy Boost and your collection, and it can be extremely helpful if you are trying to get every S card.
